page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF HELEN
page.content: My name is Helen Nesbit.I am 8 years old.I live at The Dene.I get ready then I get my breakfast of toast or cereal. Then I get washed and clean my teeth.I put my jacket on and get my bag.I go to school by bus. Mrs Kirkup the caretaker comes and opens the doors at 9'oclock.We come and take our coat off then change our shoes because we have carpets in our classroom.Then we do some Fletcher maths and some writing. Then it is play time.I make a camp.We get changed and played rounders.For lunch we had mixed vegetables, potato,mince and dumplings,jelly and blamonge.I did a picture and story about the Battle of Hastings.We had play again,then singing.I walked home,watched T.V.,had sausage and chips for tea and helped my dad in the garden.Then I watched T.V,read,had supper and went to bed.
